titles.title: A bill to clear certain impediments to the issuance of a certificate of documentation for a vessel for employment in the coastwise trade and fisheries of the United States.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.
Referred to Subcommittee on Merchant Marine.

bill.summary: 7/11/1988--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of the department in which the Coast Guard is operating to cause a named vessel to be documented as a vessel of the United States entitled to engage in the coastwise trade and fisheries.
